raw_comment:
What do you notice?
 That they both have similar percentages from 40+ They do have fewer people but have similar probabilities 
What Do you wonder?
What was the original purpose of the graph
How does this relate to you and your community?

That is how more young people responded to the survey.
What’s going on in this graph? Create a catchy headline that captures the graph’s main idea. It is showing what people think the world is like. How Good is Earth current?
ace_sentences: I notice a similarity in the percentages.
One group has fewer people than the other group.
However, both groups have similar probabilities.
I wonder about the original purpose of the graph.
I wonder how the graph relates to me.
I wonder how the graph relates to my community.
More young people responded to the survey.
I ask what is happening in this graph.
The graph shows what people think the world is like.
I ask how good Earth is currently.
I want a catchy headline that captures the main idea of the graph.
